basics.name: Zachary Thomas
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Learning new and interesting things is why I became a software developer and what drives me every day. I always want to work somewhere that reflects that. I care deeply about the people that I work with and the products I work on.

work.name: Kevel Inc.
work.summary: Engineering on the Relay real-time-bidding product.
highlights: Designed/implemented reporting feature, collating billions real time metrics into user consumable stats
Work daily on real time bidding server written in Rust
Worked with separate team when business needs required

work.name: Blinker Inc
work.summary: Lead design and implementation of backend systems.
highlights: Leading decisions and discussions on code base architectures and best practices
Contributing to all active code bases (Elixir, Rust, Typescript/React,)
Creating and facilitating technical processes and standards throughout the engineering department
Communicating the health of code bases to people outside of engineering
Continuing to hold hiring manager responsibilities

work.name: Blinker Inc
work.summary: Managed team of 3 engineers as well as lead hiring process
highlights: Handled all hiring process and management for the engineering department
Managed resourcing for projects and reported on the state of those projects
Made changes to process and structure throughout the engineering department
Worked on performance reviews and career development
Communicated state of the engineering department to other departments within the company

work.name: Blinker Inc
highlights: Worked mostly on the backend system (Elxiir/Rails) at first, but over time began to work across the stack
Wrote code for new things and for things that already exist
Worked closely with the support team and the product team to figure out what's most important to work on
Was on-call to handle and fix things that go wrong

work.name: Turing School of Software and Design
work.summary: Temporary position to help and mentor students starting out at the school
highlights: Encouraged and supported students to help them succeed in learning to code and become a software developer
Worked with an assigned cohort of students, mentoring and pairing with them
Helped track student progress through the course material

work.name: Audio Technician
work.summary: temporary position to help and mentor students starting out at the school
highlights: lead teams in settings up audio and lighting equipment specifically for the space
operated audio equipment during events/performances
worked at a variety of events, weddings, concerts, corporate, and charity
brought audio equipment to events
dealt with emergencies

work.name: T.A (Ancient Greek)
work.summary: Worked with students and faculty to help students learn the Ancient Greek language
highlights: Instructed students both inside and outside of class on Ancient Greek reading and writing
Mentored students on their translations of ancient works
Gave feedback to professors on curriculum and student progress

education.institution: Turing School of Software and Design

volunteer.summary: I organize and host the Rust NYC monthly meetup, along with a great team of talented Rustaceans throughout the east coast.
